report_a_full_bin.changelog:
Added information about potential SMS costs

BEFORE USING THIS SHORTCUT, PLEASE ENSURE THAT YOU ARE AWARE OF ANY COSTS ASSOCIATED WITH SENDING MESSAGES TO YOUR LOCAL COUNCIL, VIA SMS!
